sentences.sContent: We have to discover his plans and act accordingly.
sentences.sCn: 我们得找出他的计划，照着办。

sentences.sContent: Some of the laws were contradictory. Accordingly, measures were taken to clarify them.
sentences.sCn: 有些法律相互矛盾，因此，采取了措施将其阐明。

sentences.sContent: ...The importance of non-financial firms will accordingly rise...

trans.tranOther: in a way that is appropriate to what has been done or said in a particular situation
